notes: Its speech, ''sanguis meus et anima mea in gratiam illorum quas diligo'', is Latin for ''my blood and soul for those that I love.''<noinclude>{{JSpoiler|All players who sufficiently damage it during the last minute of the fight will receive the [[Slayer of Anmothra]] [[achievement]].}}</noinclude>
sounds: Sanguis meus et anima mea in gratiam illorum quas diligo.
And death for those who do not see.
name: Anmothra
location: [[Plains of Havoc]], north-west from [[Dark Cathedral]] and south of [[Outlaw Camp]], inside a portal for levels 20-40 ({{Mapper Coords|127.123|126.74|7|1|text=here}}), during the [[Rise of Devovorga]] [[World Quest]]. Can be fought on [[Vengoth]] during [[Devovorga's Essence Mini World Change]].
strategy: Treat it like a [[Dragon Lord]]. Easy for level 28 mages to kill using two demon skeletons, or team with one knight level 25 or higher as blocker and any shooter.
